name: God touch
description:
You have become a god. Purify the darkness with the hand of God and protect the hero.



The village was destroyed by monsters and occupied by darkness.

You can manipulate the hand of God to purify the darkness. "When exorcising the darkness, you can feel it."

Guess the monster from the feel and protect the hero.

Features of this work


・Players can control the Hand of God.

・A thrilling battle where you can guess the monster from a wide variety of items and the feel.

・Protect the hero by making full use of the items that can be obtained in each stage.

- Switch between Japanese and English.

! Attention! This game works with mouse only. Controller is not supported.
